techmeme.title: The US Department of the Treasury announces sanctions against twelve executives of Kaspersky; founder and CEO Eugene Kaspersky is not included in the sanctions (Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai/TechCrunch)
Google pauses plans to allow real-money games on the Play Store, as supporting such apps in markets without a central licensing framework proves difficult (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
OpenAI buys Rockset, an enterprise search and analytics startup that raised $105M, integrating both the tech and staff of an acquisition for the first time (Shirin Ghaffary/Bloomberg)
Some users complain that Meta is tagging real photos with its "Made with AI label", possibly because AI tools were used to edit, rather than create, the images (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
Spotify debuts a new Basic streaming plan in the US for $10.99/month, which includes all the benefits of Premium without the monthly audiobook listening time (Spotify)
